amendatorysection.para: The purpose of the Business Innovation Act is to encourage and support the transfer of Nebraska-based technology and innovation in rural and urban areas of Nebraska in order to create high growth, high technological companies, small businesses, and microenterprises and to enhance creation of wealth and quality jobs. The Legislature finds that the act will:
(5) Establish a financial assistance program pursuant to section 81-12,160 to identify commercial products and processes;
(6) Provide financial assistance pursuant to section 81-12,161 to companies using Nebraska public or private college and university researchers and facilities for applied research projects; and
(7) Provide support and funding pursuant to section 81-12,162 for microlending and microenterprise entities.
